title: (17130) L'Escala - 61 Avinguda de Montgó

name: Camping Lacus
title: (17130) Camping Lacus
description: Maité campsite in the center of L'ESCALA 100 meters from the beach with all shops nearby. Large shaded parking areas for motorhome around a lake. This place has just reopened after a period of closure. Quiet place and ideally located to enjoy the seaside. The downside is the sanitary a little outdated compared to the price.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 9 Avinguda de Montgó
description: Self-service laundry, you can also leave your clothes and they take care of washing and folding and you pick them up the next day, a very successful service so you don't have to queue.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 9 Rambla Clota
description: Free parking street, 30 meters from the port

title: (17130) L'Escala - 39 Carrer Rosa
description:
At the beginning of the forest
t de montgrit limit silent shaded dwelling in the pines

title: (17130) L'Escala - 130 Avinguda Riells
description: Quiet parking, close to the port. We have spent the night without noise. Recommendable.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 69 Avinguda Riells
description: Parking on the street, not very busy, next to the harbor it's not possible to stay.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 53 Carrer Figueres
description: Motorhome parking

title: (17130) L'Escala - 5B Carrer Puig
description: Self-service laundry in the car park of a carrefour.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 2 Ronda dels Oficis
description: Aldi parking. We slept in a problem a little noise being close to the road but the rest everything was fine.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 3-5 Ronda dels Oficis
description: Free service area including water and facilities to empty grey water and potty. No parking or electricity. Very easy to miss: right after the petrol station, on the other side of the street. Petrol station has large butane bottles, but no propane). Aldi supermarket nearby, to the left before the service area.

name: Càmping L'Escala
title: (17130) Càmping L'Escala
description: L'Escala, 21 Carrer Camí Ample. Medium capacity camping with good and reasonably sized pitches without being very big. Small supermarket on site and bar, but closed off season. No swimming pool, but exceptional sanitary. Located near old La Escala but not too far from the beaches.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 18 Carrer Ribalta
description: Parking for 240 cars but there is also a truck parked, completely free where we parked perfectly to visit the old town of L'Escala, 5 minutes from the beach.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 82 Carrer Closa d'en Llop
description: Point of drinking water, free. Benzinera EsclatOil.

name: Punta Milà
title: (17257) Punta Milà
description:
Camping punta Milà.
Camping on a human scale.
There is a pool with paddling pool for children, small supermarket, bar/restaurant.
the eplacements are shaded
We went there in June, quite a few world and very nice.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 42D Carrer del Milà
description: Places under the pines, shaded at the edge of a small road at the bottom of a housing estate, road without passage, no service but practical for going by bike or on foot, we did not sleep there. no particular prohibition. several places for the cc we were there in May so out of season but to see in summer what it gives

title: (17130) L'Escala - 4 Carrer Rusiñol
description: Public parking of the sports pavilion. No prohibition signs. Wide seats. quiet night

title: (17130) L'Escala - Unnamed Road
description: Place in the middle of nature, surrounded by pine trees and fields are also seen. There is a small dirt road next to it but hardly any cars pass by. It is a quiet place, without any service. We go by van but it can be accessed by motorhome.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 2 Carrer Miramar
description: In the middle of the scale, 15 free parking spaces 10mn from the old town.

name: Camping Cala Montgó
title: (17130) Camping Cala Montgó
description: The site has sanitary facilities and access to electricity. Very natural space with a pine pool is also available, as is a supermarket. The campsite is divided by two, one side with pool and restaurant and the other with an extra exit to the beach. The beach is about 200 meters away on foot.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 244 Avinguda de Montgó
description: Free parking space in quiet subdivision along the street! Between Villa Mateua and Cala Montgo (5 minutes walk on each side)! Supermarket 5 min walk! No service area in the area!

name: Illa Mateua Càmping Resort
title: (17130) Illa Mateua Càmping Resort
description:
The Illa Mateua campsite has several spacious plots in the middle of nature. Also many sites are in the shade and others in the sun. Exceptional location. one access to the north to the cliffs and rocky beaches and another access to the south to a sandy beach. It has two swimming pools.
It is only 2 km from the historic center of L'Escala and 20 km from Figueres and 40 from the Girona airport.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 14 Carrer Travesser
description: Parking filled during the day for the beach but empty in the evening and at night with a shady corner

title: (17130) Torroella de Montgrí - 21 Carrer Montgo
description: Paid parking. Cala Montgo at 200m with showers and restaurants.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 272 Avinguda de Montgó
description: small lot. You can park, there are no prohibitions. We have spent the whole day here. It is 3 minutes from the beach

title: (17130) Torroella de Montgrí - 14 Passeig Platja
description: Unpaved street near cala montgo. It is requested, even if it is a truism, to leave the area as it was found so that the neighbors do not complain.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 4-6 Avinguda Francesc Macià
description: Lidl supermarket car park near the beach and for beautiful walks and bike rides in front of the Mercadona car park

title: (17130) Torroella de Montgrí - 12 Carrer del Jonc
title_short: (17130) Torroella de Montgrí - 12 Carrer del Jonc
description: Street parking at 50 m beach.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 4 Carrer Port del Rei
description: Parking in Carrer Port del Rei street. 2 minutes walk from Cala Illa Mateua and 5 minutes from Cala Montgo. Without any limitation, quiet night, although until 00:00 the disco of the campsite was heard at full volume, but then all night very quiet. Plastic, paper, glass and generic containers. Several restaurants. Water drainage area and free filling 10 minutes.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 2 A-7 a l'Escala Ge-623
description: Location with some free places, ideal to go to the beach "La Escala" and visit the ruins of "Ampurias" or just eat. Not advise to stay overnight.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 60 Carrer Punta Montgó
description: Limited to 2 meters high. Lots of diver with a hardware rental shop right next door and a great view bar and access to the cove

title: (17130) L'Escala - 10 A-7 a l'Escala Ge-623
description: Parking possible for one night or weekend (nursery opposite), not far from the beach and shops 5 min walk, quiet place facing a field and road 200 meters away but which did not bother us to sleep.

title: (17130) Torroella de Montgrí - 54 Passeig Platja
description: Parking de 3 plazas en carretera sin salida, muy tranquilo. Aceso a sendero sobre acantilados.

title: () Montgo - Passatge Albera
description:
Exceptional view of the Bay of Roses. However this is too good and is busy all night. For peace to bring balls for the ears. Pebbles are available to wedge as it is quite steep.
Otherwise not find much good. Campsites are very expensive.
The Rei beach is beautiful, arrive early to park in spikes to the south (great unsuitable camper vans). The walk along the coast path going to the beach is superb. ATV Estartit can be reached by roads or tracks closed to cars.
On the beach can rent canoes to visit the caves.

title: (17257) Bellcaire d'Empordà - Camí dels Escalencs
description: Along the path used by a few walkers, cyclists ... Sandy soil. Good for one night

title: (17130) L'Escala - Carretera Museu
description:
Handy for direct access to the beach, handy for visiting Greek and Roman ruins, €8/day, no service but showers at the beach, toilets on the way to the beach. Pay attention to small ants on flat ground at the bottom, there are fewer in height.

No height limit during the summer

title: (17130) L'Escala - Unnamed Road
description: Since the place ahead was already busy, we decided to drive back. While driving back we came across a forest road on our right side. We entered it and drove until we could not go any further, because of the vegetation, etc. We slept in a nice open spot. Blissfully quiet and with a magnificent view! Not for large vehicles!

title: (17130) Sant Martí d'Empúries - 5 Plaça Petita
description: Very nice parking lot under trees only 100m from the beach and about 800m from the excavations. Now free of charge in the low season, barrier is open, very quiet and idyllic location.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 26 Ronda Sant Pere Pescador
description: To park the time to visit the beautiful village of Saint Marti d'Empuries.

title: (17130) L'Escala - 2 Carrer de les Dunes
description: Quiet street, near the beach dunes. Some shade that is appreciated in the morning. Nearby there is restoration. Sant Marti with ruins is fantastic to see. Bike ride that reaches the Scale.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - Carretera de l'Escala a l'Estartit
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - Carretera de l'Escala a l'Estartit
description: Location in plain nature accessible by motorhome with nasturtium which is quite rare on the Costa Brava. The path is in the ground but it is a real road. Some cars and hikers in the morning but really not bothering the song of cuckoos.

title: (17130) Cinc Claus - Carretera Sant Martí d'Empúries
title_short: (17130) Cinc Claus - Carretera Sant Martí d'Empúries
description: We saw the river, perfect for a stopover. At the edge of a road with very little traffic.

title: (17141) Bellcaire d'Empordà - 16 Carrer Orient
description: Public parking in the town of Bellcaire. Good views and quiet at night. Hiking and biking trails to L'Escala, L'Estartit and Torrellas de Montgri. Nearby food stores in the same town.

name: Àrea Camper Massís del Montgrí
title: (17141) Àrea Camper Massís del Montgrí
description: Camper Park Massís del Montgrí area is a private parking for motorhomes and campers. It has all the necessary services for these vehicles, in addition to offering a series of amenities and parallel activities to enjoy the experience. The area is a tourist information point so as not to miss any detail of everything that our environment offers. 24 hour access by appointment.

name: Camping La Ballena Alegre
title: (17470) Camping La Ballena Alegre
description: Camping La Ballena Alegre! Great but quiet campsite. The main street runs through the entire campsite and the plots are in dead ends, which means that there is no movement in front of the plots. Direct exit to the beach. 3 swimming pools, entertainment and several restaurants

title: (17140) Ullà -
description: Place to sleep, open area with access by path. Flat area. Access only for 4x4s. Strongly not recommended for non-all-terrain vehicles.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - Camí de Bellcaire a Santa Caterina
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - Camí de Bellcaire a Santa Caterina
description: The road turns into a dirt road with stones, it is about 10 minutes. There is a prohibited camping sign. There is a bar in the hermitage, barbecues and bathrooms.

address.street: Camí de Bellcaire a Santa Caterina

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí -
description: A dirt road leads to some flat areas before the track forks towards the Monastery of Santa Catarina and the hiking trail to the castle. I haven't parked here myself, but it seemed like a peaceful and quiet place in nature to start hiking. Take your trash!!

name: Camping Balena Allegre
title: (17470) Camping Balena Allegre
description: Sant Pere Pescador, Unnamed Road. Camping Balena Allegre. Expensive campsite in high season 46 euros the location but excellent quality of services, calm and beach all the Long. Electricity and water are included in the dog price accepted. Very large and shaded sites.

title: (17137) Viladamat - 7 Carrer de la Creu
description: Parking day and night. Good access, 4 km from the beach by bike lane. Very quiet village and good shops and artisan butchers, restaurants and bar. Day and night parking. Good access and 4 km from the beach by bike lane. Very quiet village and good shops and artisan butchers, bars and restaurants.

title: (17130) Sant Martí d'Empúries -
description: Dirt road behind the Fata nightclub, a spacious place where 5 or 6 vans can park quietly, it does not have any services but it is a hundred meters from the beach.

name: Càmping Les Dunes
title: (17470) Càmping Les Dunes
description: Sant Pere Pescador, 0 Carrer Platja. Camping Las Dunas, with a very good quality Camping belongs to the Pilot Group, has direct access to the beach, well maintained and clean, very quiet. Plots of 75-100 m2 separated by hedges. The fun pool for children.

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - Camí del Castell
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - Camí del Castell
description: Overnight

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 30 Avinguda del Ripollès
title_short: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 30 Avinguda del Ripollès
description: Drinking water source in a children's playground going up to the Torre Vella urbanization

title: (17258) L'Estartit -
description: Very pleasant place on the heights of the east attracts in the middle of nature overlooking the sea. Inaccessible to motorhomes without service

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 49 Ronda Pau Casals
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 49 Ronda Pau Casals
description: Quiet parking lot at the foot of a mountain, on the outskirts. At night without lights. We parked here in the morning to hike to the castle. Great view! You can definitely spend the night here too. No designated parking space for mobile homes, but also no prohibition sign…

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 39 Avinguda de Francesc Macià
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 39 Avinguda de Francesc Macià
description: Small spot under the olive trees, we spent a quiet night in a converted car. (no police passing or particular discomfort) there is a large municipal car park a little further in the village with a drinking water point and public toilets (disabled access). there's a gymnasium and a stadium nearby, when there's a party you can hear it but it's not a problem.

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 35 Carrer Primavera
description: Quiet place with beautiful view

title: (17470) - 1 Carrer Carme
description: Ground parking next to the beach. Height limit.

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 223 Carretera de Torroella
title_short: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 223 Carretera de Torroella
description: Gas station esclat oil. they let fill water and drain gray water in floor grid

title: (17140) Ullà -
description: Water at the gas station. Free

title: (17134) La Tallada d'Empordà - 11 Carrer Sant Joan de Pladecorts
title_short: (17134) La Tallada d'Empordà - 11 Carrer Sant Joan de Pladecorts
description:
The La Tallada D'Empordà motorhome area is located in the center of the l'Empordà region, a very charming and peaceful natural environment, 8 km from l'Escala.

The area has all the basic services; drainage, light, water, electricity, wc, outdoor cold water shower, sink, Wi-Fi zone, surveillance, information, picnic area, sports area, etc. In addition, it has a restaurant (closed on Tuesdays) a few meters away and a small supermarket (9am to 1pm). 24/7 access with automatic barrier, code is needed to access. (Qr code at the entrance with information). The code can also be requested by phone, email, WhatsApp or website. There is no limit of meters all vehicles are welcome :)

name: Càmping Castell Montgrí
title: (17258) Càmping Castell Montgrí
description: Campsite Castell Montgri ****. Campsite welcoming vans/motorhomes from 2 nights. Many pitches in the shade ranging from 60 to 90m2. Clean toilets. 3 beautiful swimming pools. 2 hiking departures. Quite festive with entertainment until midnight. Catering service on site. Only 10min by bike from the center of Estartit (30min on foot and taxi/bus available).  (not so expensive compared to other campsites).

name: Camping Emporda
title: (17258) Camping Emporda
description: Very clean family campsite with pitches in the shade and in the sun plots delimited by trees, beautiful swimming pool, very friendly welcome. Town center 10 minutes on foot, beautiful bike rides to do.

name: Cámping Estartit
title: (17258) Cámping Estartit
description: Camping Estartit, run by a wonderful Dutch family. It is very comfortable, with several types of accommodation and at a good price. A few meters from the center and 5min walk from the beach. With all the necessary services.

title: (17134) La Tallada d'Empordà - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place (private unfenced) next to a small woodland and a group of bamboo plants near a small river. Perfect to spend a quiet night. We drove the car directly into the forest during the day when it was too hot to be outside. Small vehicle only.

name: Camping Ter
title: (17258) Camping Ter
description: Camping Ter attracted attention after our 2 days stay with a well thought-out infrastructure and nice hosts. The furniture is a bit old but completely intact. We felt good. Flooring lawn and shady trees :-)

address.street: 142 Camí Vell de Torroella a l'Estartit

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 57 Carrer del Garbí
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 57 Carrer del Garbí
description: Ample municipal parking, where vehicles can park up to 3.5 t. There are public toilets, just below the parking.

title: (17258) L'Estartit - 133 Carretera de Torroella
description: Very large parking for cars, vans and motorhomes. It has picnic tables and public restrooms.

title: (17258) L'Estartit - km 4,8 Carretera de Torroella
description: Is the outer parking of a camping is silence and big.

name: Camping Rifort
title: (17258) Camping Rifort
description: Camping with all services. Swimming pool with jacuzzi area, complete bar, modern. A little expensive after seeing other places, we sinned of newbies but my son thanked him (he didn't leave the pool until we left).

name: Camping Aquarius
title: (17470) Camping Aquarius
description: Large, clean, well-organized place right on the beach. Full in summer and still full in autumn. Clean sanitary, great shop & restaurant. The wine shop 600m away is also worthwhile :-)

name: Càmping La Sirena, L'Estartit
title: (17258) Càmping La Sirena, L'Estartit
description:
Our beautiful shaded or sunny pitches are waiting for you.
With our Bar / restaurant (open from May 1st to the end of September) to quench your thirst!
Our swimming pool (open from May to the end of September) to refresh you!
Mini club open July August to entertain you!
3 toilet blocks in perfect condition at each corner of the campsite!
1km from the city center and 50m from the beach offering an ideal setting for families looking for relaxation and entertainment!
A stone's throw from the campsite, kayak, diving boat... the Medes islands at your feet.
We will welcome you from March 10 to October 25, 2023.

See you soon !

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 28 Carrer Riu Ter
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 28 Carrer Riu Ter
description: Torroella de Montgri. Large parking without service, quiet and convenient to visit the city and the castle. Very quiet super for a nuot

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 44 Carrer de la Devesa
title_short: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 44 Carrer de la Devesa
description: In line parking, allowed by municipal police for the night, do not put anything outside the vehicle, we can stop anywhere, other than the beachfront. Well done for the city and municipal police.

name: Autocaravaning Costa Brava Area
title: (17258) Autocaravaning Costa Brava Area
description:
✴️COSTA BRAVA AREA  is a modern parking area with exclusive services for motorhomes and campers, designed for the ease, comfort, tranquility and safety of motorhomes. Located in the center of the town next to the beach and all shops in a very quiet environment. 
✴️ONLINE RESERVATIONS through our website if you are en route or planning your next getaway. 
✴️OPEN 365 DAYS a year from 7:00 a.m. to 11:00 p.m. Customer service reception hours and self-contracting system. The accesses, the streets and the dock are designed to facilitate the maneuverability of the motorhomes. 
✴️PITCHES with different surfaces (standard, superior or VIP) tailored to suit your vehicle, even for large motorhomes or trailers. 
✴️SECURITY guaranteed in a fully fenced area with security cameras, night lighting and barrier access control. After 11:00 p.m., the venue is completely closed, only with pedestrian access for customers. 
✴️SERVICES IN THE DAY RATE: seat allocation | dock use | basic Wi-Fi | toilet | sinks. 
✴️SERVICES WITH A CHARGE: electricity €5.00 (may vary according to electricity rates) | water €1.00 / 3 min | showers €1.00 / 3 min | washing machine €4.00 | dryer €5.00 | enjoy unlimited premium Wi-Fi (for a fee).

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 56 Passeig Marítim
description: This parking place was ideal for us. From 6 o’clock in the evening till nine then it becomes free, from nine in the evening till nine in the morning and Motorhome is 2.7 m high and we were told by several people including the police that we could not park down on the beach as we were over 2 m high and that they would in force this so we parked here. it was noisy up till 12 and then went quiet. after that we had a good night sleep and no problem you can only feed the meter for three hours in the day . It is only a short walking distance to the port where you can rent jetskis in speedboats a short walk to the beach also 200 m to bars and restaurants

title: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 41 Passeig de Vicenç Bou
title_short: (17257) Torroella de Montgrí - 41 Passeig de Vicenç Bou
description: Washing machine tumble dryer owner very nice no reference on Google map open 24/24 opening button on the front door washing machine 6th laundry included dryer 3rd

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 68 Passeig Marítim
description: Parking car in empty spike in this season not seen prohibition sign parked on 3 places cause length 7 m returning from the restaurant, we had a contravention so avoid the park beach car parking empty spike in this parking lot

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Unnamed Road
description: Very little frequented parking, 5 meters from the beach, very quiet !!

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 25 Carrer del Freu
title_short: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 25 Carrer del Freu
description: Laundry and dryer service

name: Autocaravaning La Granja
title: (17257) Autocaravaning La Granja
description:
Camper area located on a family farm. Natural Park of Montgrí and Les Illes Medes. Hiking routes 
 ( Montgrí castle ) and greenways by bicycle ( The river Ter ).  On Monday, weekly market.

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 43 Avinguda de la Costa Brava
title_short: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 43 Avinguda de la Costa Brava
description: Water tap next to skate park. For removal with a bucket or watering can. The tap is 3 meters from the curb. No other service. Garbage can about 30 meters along the road.

title: (17257) - 1P Lloc Camps de Can Bataller SU6
title_short: (17257)  - 1P Lloc Camps de Can Bataller SU6
description: Discreet, quiet, paved and central parking, we spent the night very quiet without any noise, it is just behind the carrefour behind some buildings and the truth is the best we found in the area.

address.street: 1P Lloc Camps de Can Bataller SU6

title: (17258) L'Estartit - Pg. Maritim
description: Only parking, no camping and a maximum height of 2 meters, a maximum width of 2 meters. So a California bus can park here . Nice place on the beach!

name: Càmping Les Medes
title: (17258) Càmping Les Medes
description: Camping Les Medes Cat.1, Paratge Tree Camp, 17258 L'Estartit, first class campsite. Amazing bathroom facilities. With indoor pool, but the outdoor pool is closed in October. At least 1 km from the beach. Open all year Plots too small, spaces too narrow between the trees.

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 23 Carrer Salines
description: Calle de les Salines playing promenade, next to the beach, camping is prohibited but no parking. 24h View of the Medes Islands

title: (17258) Torroella de Montgrí - 1 Passeig Molinet
description: This is a great little spot in town. unfortunately parking restrictions are tight. we come in at 6 pm put the fee in the meter, which takes us to 9 o’clock, then you have from 9 o’clock till 9 o’clock in the morning free. the maximum stay is three hours so we put another fee in the meter which takes us to 12 o’clock and move away. we are 6 m and it is hard to find a bay that will take us, but as you can see you can overhang in the bays. there are toilets opposite and you can get water down at the marina in containers on the beach to the left and fireboats also from the marina. there are plenty of good restaurants to eat from in the evening which is not noisy. in the evening goes quiet, about midnight completely. great walks, great swimming and really nice people.

name: Camping L'àmfora
title: (17470) Camping L'àmfora
description: Large, spacious campsite directly on the long, wide sandy beach. Plots of various sizes and equipment. Very nicely laid out with lots of flowers. Sanitary facilities very large, new and very clean. Swimming pool, slides, 2 restaurants, large very well stocked supermarket. Great large leisure area with trampolines, pump track, climbing facilities for the kids.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 3 Carrer de Josep Pla
title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 3 Carrer de Josep Pla
description: Esplanada near the Amfora campsite, I am not sure if it is possible to spend the night, I have slept here with a small van and no problem.

title: (17257) Gualta -
description: 2 camper pitches with electricity and water at the pitch & putt golf course. You can park here for free when you use the golf course spent in restaurant. Best to book in advance through reception. Very friendly staff. Beautiful par 3 golf course!

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 1 Carrer Almogàvers
description: Parking 5 min from the beach, no prohibition or height restriction, we did not stay there overnight. Peaceful place ! There is also a cycle path on the side of the road.

title: (17258) Els Griells - 7 Passeig Marítim
description: It is a gravel parking lot in a residential area, very large and half empty around 8:30 a.m. on a Tuesday, suitable for our 6.36m long and 2.60m high Citroën pössl. Perfect for kayak tours (5 min to the organizer)! Unfortunately, due to the height, you are not allowed to stand on the beach: /

title: (17257) Gualta - C-31
description: Picnic area with parking and content. Sense serveis però to the coast of the road to Torroella.

title: (17258) Els Griells - 22 Carrer Tulipa
description: Place that say nothing about the parking of motorhomes. Little shade but very close to the beach (50mts) We did not see any services. But if a little tourist train passes by. On the beach there are dutxas. The place is an esplanade of land. Respect the place. And enjoy! !!!!! There is height limitation 2.2 Galibo

title: (17142) Verges - 51 Carrer Baix Empordà
description: They leave you a hose to fill the tank, you have to ask for the tap key and the hose in the box, the gas station is very kind.

name: Camping El Molino
title: (17258) Camping El Molino
description: Torroella de Montgrí, 365 Avinguda de les Illes Medes. Very close to the beach. El Molino campsite is located south of the village of L'Estartit opposite the Medas islands by the sea. Hot water (0.50 Eur / 5 million).

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Carretera de la platja
title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Carretera de la platja
description: Parking near the campsite Gaviota. 1 night passed without problem in April. Right next to the beach.

title: (17472) L'Armentera - Carretera Armentera
description: A beautiful place right on the river Fluvia.

name: Camping La Gaviota
title: (17470) Camping La Gaviota
description: Small campsite with medium-sized pitches. It has a small market, bar and restaurant. Good cleaning of the bathrooms. Direct access to the beach. A bit too noisy in August. Valid for a few day stopover.

name: Camping las Palmeras Costa Brava
title: (17470) Camping las Palmeras Costa Brava
description:
Las Palmeras is a small, very quiet and comfortable campsite on the Costa Brava, where we are sure our clients will have an unforgettable stay. The facilities are designed especially families minded, where you will find everything necessary to make your stay enjoyable.

Another attraction of our campsite is that it’s situated next to the Natural Park of Aiguamolls de l’Empordà, a unique area where you can see the fauna and nature of this region. We are just a kilometer from the small, traditionally agricultural village of Sant Pere Pescador, far from the tourist crowds.

At 250 meters is a long sandy beach with shallow waters and monitored by lifeguards during the summer months which makes it really safe for children. You will find Beach bars for eating or having drinks during the day or to enjoy the nightlife scene. A privileged location for practising windsurfing and kitesurfing, with schools for those who wish to start practising these sports.

title: (17466) Garrigoles - 1 Diseminado Mas dels Frares
description:
COMARCA PARKING will be closed from 1 to 15 September inclusive.
-- 
4-hectare farm located in the middle of nature, where you can live with horses, and enjoy an environment full of many possibilities. With the sea 10 kilometers away, and various routes for walking and cycling. Availability of 12 places with electricity and water. The owner Alex, a nature lover, will welcome you and inform you of everything you need. Reservations are appreciated by Whatsapp. Entry limit time: 9:00 p.m.
Booking with Whatsapp.
Informations per email.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 5 Carrer del Joncar

title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - 3 Camí de la Mota
description: A large parking lot in front of a soccer field. There are a few junk cars here, which is why you don't even really stand out. No signage to prohibit, signposted as parking. Relatively close to a town exit road, but traffic is limited and parking is available about 50m off the road. Not particularly pretty, but relatively quiet between the field, soccer field and street.

name: Camperpark Mas del Joncar
title: (17470) Camperpark Mas del Joncar
description: Located in the Aiguamolls de l'Empordà natural park, very close to the town (sant pere pescador), next to the river, near the sea. Site with electricity and water. Possibility of bathing in the swimming pool of the rural tourism house, if the occupation of the swimming pool is less than 18 people. You can have breakfast and dinner. Accepted animals. If you are looking for tranquility, this is your place. Very nice owners.

title: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Camí del Joncar
title_short: (17470) Sant Pere Pescador - Camí del Joncar
description: We have been in this parking lot for 3 nights (during the week). Large spacious area with nice views. Many boats, kayakers and jet skis since you can also do water sports here. There are marked places for motorhomes all over the area but you can park wherever you want. Enter, draw a ticket at the barrier for the entire site and on departure you pay at a machine. The barrier opens automatically. A few minutes walk to the beach. The grounds are maintained, there are trash cans everywhere and we also saw someone picking up trash. On the corner is a beach bar with toilets. We were not bothered by music from the bar. We did not use the toilets. No further services so you have to be self-sufficient. Please respect the location and be thankful that this spot is now available (paid) for campers/caravans in this region. For more information see photos.

title: (17133) Serra de Daró - Carrer de la Font
title_short: (17133) Serra de Daró - Carrer de la Font

Drinking water and recycling point.

Update: the water does not taste very nice after a couple of hours, like a chlorine taste so I do not recommend it for drinking.

title: (17133) Serra de Daró - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful place in the countryside. Access via a good dirt road, very wide and feasible for larger vehicles. Place very quiet, a few cars, cyclists or pedestrians, but all with a smile on their faces. (Place was very littered!! First cleaned up! Please take garbage with you!) Stayed 3 days without any problems

About 30 plots, about 70m2, with 10A electrical connection and water. The pitches are designed for tent (+car), caravan (+car), van or motorhome camping. One animal only accepted.

Once on the sandy path, pass the two houses on the left and take the path on the left just after the second house. A few dozen meters away in the forest, on the right, you can park flat among the pines. Further to the left, there is another high ledge for a second car.

title: (17480) Roses - Carrer de Gauguin

title: (17480) Roses - 10 Carretera Canyelles
description: Parking in the land of the lighthouse of Roses, below the road. Some trees, view and sea access, next to a path by the sea. Not bad passage day but quiet at night. Steep access on a few meters but concreted.

title: (17256) Pals - 3 Carrer Enric Fort Prolongacio
description: Small quiet car park with shady camping tables nearby. The price is correct and with a little luck we can find a place in the shade. The car park is near the historic center on foot.

title: (17256) Pantaleu -
description: To enjoy the tranquility without entering a parking lot full of cars. Suitable for medium vans but something just right for GV and AC. Good place on the limits of the area "La Muntanya Seca" and very close to a multitude of stone villages typical of the area such as Palau-Sator, Peratallada, Sant Feliu de Boada, Torrent... You can go to all of them by bike from here without having to move the van.

title: (17487) Castelló d'Empúries - Carretera de la Rajolería
title_short: (17487) Castelló d'Empúries - Carretera de la Rajolería

name: Camping Ampurdanés
title: (17480) Camping Ampurdanés
description: Campsite Ampurdanes. Small, rather authentic campsite. It could have been nice because in addition to the beach. a small pitch with electricity, and no hot water in the showers. I still find the price expensive.

title: (17480) Roses - 1-5 Carretera Canyelles
